price: (15) But they have attributed to Him from His servants a portion.[1434] Indeed, man is clearly ungrateful.
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ لَهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ جُزۡءًاۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ مُّبِينٌ
footnotes: [1434]- By claiming that He (subḥānahu wa taʿālā) has a son or daughters, as it is said that a child is part of his parent.  This concept is totally incompatible with Allāh's unity and exclusiveness.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū lahu min ʿibādihi juz'an inna al-insāna lakafūrun mubīnun
